item.title: A Decentralized Blog
item.description: This blog is now hosted on IPFS, the Interplanetary Filesystem. I’m using Hugo and Fleek.co to automatically build and deploy the static files on IPFS. There are three ways to see this page. The first is to use a standard browser (Chrome, Firefox..etc) with extensions such as IPFS Companion that uses a IPNS gateway set up by default (or you can install IPFS and run a node locally), or the Metamask plugin, and when you type http://alebaffa.
